trans-unit.source: How to Prepare a Configuration Package | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: How to Prepare a Configuration Package | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Jak si připravit konfigurační balíček | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: When you configure a new company, table relations are recognized and processed.

seg-source.mrk: When you configure a new company, table relations are recognized and processed.

target.mrk: Při konfiguraci nové společnosti jsou relace tabulky rozpoznány a zpracovány.

trans-unit.source: Data is imported and applied in the correct order.

seg-source.mrk: Data is imported and applied in the correct order.

target.mrk: Data jsou importována a použita ve správném pořadí.

trans-unit.source: Dimension tables are also imported if they are included in the configuration package.

seg-source.mrk: Dimension tables are also imported if they are included in the configuration package.

target.mrk: Tabulky dimenzí se také importují, pokud jsou součástí konfiguračního balíčku.

trans-unit.source: Prepare a Configuration Package

seg-source.mrk: Prepare a Configuration Package

target.mrk: Příprava konfiguračního balíčku

trans-unit.source: When you configure a new company, table relations are recognized and processed.

seg-source.mrk: When you configure a new company, table relations are recognized and processed.

target.mrk: Při konfiguraci nové společnosti jsou relace tabulky rozpoznány a zpracovány.

trans-unit.source: Data is imported and applied in the correct order.

seg-source.mrk: Data is imported and applied in the correct order.

target.mrk: Data jsou importována a použita ve správném pořadí.

trans-unit.source: Dimension tables are also imported if they are included in the configuration package.

seg-source.mrk: Dimension tables are also imported if they are included in the configuration package.

target.mrk: Tabulky dimenzí se také importují, pokud jsou součástí konfiguračního balíčku.

trans-unit.source: To help your customer use the configuration package, you may want to add a questionnaire or a set of questionnaires to the package.

seg-source.mrk: To help your customer use the configuration package, you may want to add a questionnaire or a set of questionnaires to the package.

target.mrk: Chcete-li pomoci zákazníkovi používat konfigurační balíček, můžete do balíčku přidat dotazník nebo sadu dotazníků.

trans-unit.source: The questionnaire can help the customer in understanding the various setup options.

seg-source.mrk: The questionnaire can help the customer in understanding the various setup options.

target.mrk: Dotazník může zákazníkovi pomoct při pochopení různých možností nastavení.

trans-unit.source: Typically, questionnaires are created for the major setup tables where a customer may require additional guidance about how to select an appropriate setting.

seg-source.mrk: Typically, questionnaires are created for the major setup tables where a customer may require additional guidance about how to select an appropriate setting.

target.mrk: Obvykle jsou vytvářeny dotazníky pro hlavní tabulky nastavení, kde zákazník může vyžadovat další pokyny, jak vybrat vhodné nastavení.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Gather Customer Setup Values](admin-gather-customer-setup-values.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Gather Customer Setup Values](admin-gather-customer-setup-values.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [ Shromáždění hodnot nastavení zákazníka ](admin-gather-customer-setup-values.md).

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you are on the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center.

seg-source.mrk: Make sure that you are on the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center.

target.mrk: Ujistěte se, že jste v centru rolí Implementátor služeb RapidStart.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Use the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center](admin-how-to-use-the-rapidstart-services-role-center-to-track-progress.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Use the RapidStart Services Implementer Role Center](admin-how-to-use-the-rapidstart-services-role-center-to-track-progress.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Používání role Implementátor služeb RapidStart](admin-how-to-use-the-rapidstart-services-role-center-to-track-progress.md).

trans-unit.source: When exporting and importing configuration packages between two company databases, the databases should have the same schema to ensure that all data is transferred successfully.

seg-source.mrk: When exporting and importing configuration packages between two company databases, the databases should have the same schema to ensure that all data is transferred successfully.

target.mrk: Při exportu a importu konfiguračních balíčků mezi dvěma databázemi společnosti by databáze měly mít stejné schéma, aby se zajistilo úspěšné přenesení všech dat.

trans-unit.source: This means that the databases should have the same table and field structure, in which the tables have the same primary keys and fields have the same IDs and data types.

seg-source.mrk: This means that the databases should have the same table and field structure, in which the tables have the same primary keys and fields have the same IDs and data types.

target.mrk: To znamená, že databáze by měly mít stejnou tabulku a strukturu polí, ve kterých tabulky mají stejné primární klíče a pole mají stejné ID a datové typy.

trans-unit.source: You can import a configuration package that has been exported from a database that has a different schema than that target database.

seg-source.mrk: You can import a configuration package that has been exported from a database that has a different schema than that target database.

target.mrk: Můžete importovat konfigurační balíček, který byl exportován z databáze, která má jiné schéma než tato cílová databáze.

trans-unit.source: However, any tables or fields in the configuration package that are missing in the target database will not be imported.

seg-source.mrk: However, any tables or fields in the configuration package that are missing in the target database will not be imported.

target.mrk: Avšak žádné tabulky nebo pole v konfiguračním balíčku, které chybí v cílové databázi, nebudou importovány.

trans-unit.source: Tables with different primary keys and fields with different data types will also not successfully import.

seg-source.mrk: Tables with different primary keys and fields with different data types will also not successfully import.

target.mrk: Tabulky s různými primárními klíči a poli s různými datovými typy se také neimportují úspěšně.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the configuration pack includes table **50000, Customer** that has primary key **Code20** and the database to which you import the pack includes table **50000, Customer Bank Account** that has the primary key **Code20 + Code 20**, then data will not be imported.

seg-source.mrk: For example, if the configuration pack includes table **50000, Customer** that has primary key **Code20** and the database to which you import the pack includes table **50000, Customer Bank Account** that has the primary key **Code20 + Code 20**, then data will not be imported.

target.mrk: Pokud například konfigurační balíček obsahuje tabulku **50000, zákazník**, která má primární klíč **Kód20**, a databáze, do které importujete balíček, zahrnuje tabulku **50000, bankovní účet zákazníka**, která má primární klíč **Kód20 + Kód20**, potom data nebudou importována.

trans-unit.source: To create a configuration package

seg-source.mrk: To create a configuration package

target.mrk: Pro vytvoření konfiguračního balíčku

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Configuration Packages**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Configuration Packages**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Zvolte ikonu ![Hledat stránku nebo sestavu](media/ui-search/search_small.png "ikona Hledat stránku nebo sestavu"), klikněte na **Konfigurační balíčky** a poté zvolte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **New** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **New** action.

target.mrk: Zvolte akci **Nový**.

trans-unit.source: On the **General** FastTab, fill in the fields as appropriate.

seg-source.mrk: On the **General** FastTab, fill in the fields as appropriate.

target.mrk: V záložce **Obecné** vyplňte pole podle potřeby.

trans-unit.source: To exclude the configuration questionnaires, configuration templates, and configuration worksheet tables from the package, select the **Exclude Configuration Tables** check box.

seg-source.mrk: To exclude the configuration questionnaires, configuration templates, and configuration worksheet tables from the package, select the **Exclude Configuration Tables** check box.

target.mrk: Chcete-li z balíčku vyloučit konfigurační dotazníky, konfigurační šablony a tabulky konfiguračních sešitů, zaškrtněte políčko **Vyloučit konfigurační tabulky**.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, these tables will be added to the list of package tables automatically when you export the package.

seg-source.mrk: Otherwise, these tables will be added to the list of package tables automatically when you export the package.

target.mrk: V opačném případě budou tyto tabulky při exportu balíčku automaticky přidány do seznamu tabulek balíčků.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Get Tables** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Get Tables** action.

target.mrk: Zvolte akci **Získat tabulky**.

trans-unit.source: The **Get Package Tables** batch job window opens.

seg-source.mrk: The **Get Package Tables** batch job window opens.

target.mrk: Otevře se okno dávkové úlohy **Získat tabulky balíčků**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Select Tables** field.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Select Tables** field.

target.mrk: Zvolte pole **Vybrat tabulky**.

trans-unit.source: The **Config. Selection** window opens.

seg-source.mrk: The **Config.
Selection** window opens.

target.mrk: Otevře se okno **Výběr
konfigurace**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Select All** action to add all tables to the package, or select the **Selected** check box for each table in the list that you want to add.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Select All** action to add all tables to the package, or select the **Selected** check box for each table in the list that you want to add.

target.mrk: Vyberte akci **Vybrat vše,** chcete-li přidat všechny tabulky do balíčku, nebo zaškrtněte políčko **Vybráno** u každé tabulky v seznamu, kterou chcete přidat.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **OK** button.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **OK** button.

target.mrk: Zvolte tlačítko **OK**.

trans-unit.source: The count of tables that you have selected is indicated in the **Select Tables** field.

seg-source.mrk: The count of tables that you have selected is indicated in the **Select Tables** field.

target.mrk: Počet tabulek, které jste vybrali, je uveden v poli **Vybrat tabulky**.

trans-unit.source: Specify additional options, and then choose the **OK** button.

seg-source.mrk: Specify additional options, and then choose the **OK** button.

target.mrk: Zadejte další možnosti a poté klepněte na tlačítko **OK**.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] tables are added to the lines of the **Config. Package** window.

seg-source.mrk: tables are added to the lines of the **Config.
Package** window.

target.mrk: tabulky jsou přidány do řádků stránky **Konfigurační
balíček**.

trans-unit.source: You can also do this in the configuration worksheet.

seg-source.mrk: You can also do this in the configuration worksheet.

target.mrk: Toto můžete také provést v konfiguračním sešitu.

trans-unit.source: Select the tables you want to include in the package, and then choose the **Assign Package** action.

seg-source.mrk: Select the tables you want to include in the package, and then choose the **Assign Package** action.

target.mrk: Vyberte tabulky, které chcete zahrnout do balíčku, a poté vyberte akci **Přiřadit balíček**.

trans-unit.source: To select the fields that you want to include from a table, select the table, and then, on the **Lines** tab, choose the **Fields** action.

seg-source.mrk: To select the fields that you want to include from a table, select the table, and then, on the **Lines** tab, choose the **Fields** action.

target.mrk: Chcete-li vybrat pole, která chcete zahrnout z tabulky, vyberte tabulku a poté na kartě **Řádky** vyberte akci **Pole**.

trans-unit.source: Specify which fields are included in the package.

seg-source.mrk: Specify which fields are included in the package.

target.mrk: Určete, která pole jsou součástí balíčku.

trans-unit.source: By default, all fields are included.

seg-source.mrk: By default, all fields are included.

target.mrk: Ve výchozím nastavení jsou zahrnuta všechna pole.

trans-unit.source: To select just the fields you want to include, choose the **Clear Included** action.

seg-source.mrk: To select just the fields you want to include, choose the **Clear Included** action.

target.mrk: Chcete-li vybrat pouze pole, která chcete zahrnout, vyberte akci **Odstranit Zahrnuto**.

trans-unit.source: To add all fields, choose the **Set Included** action.

seg-source.mrk: To add all fields, choose the **Set Included** action.

target.mrk: Chcete-li přidat všechna pole, vyberte akci **Nastavit Zahrnuto**.

trans-unit.source: To specify that the field data should not be validated, clear the **Validate Field** check box for the field.

seg-source.mrk: To specify that the field data should not be validated, clear the **Validate Field** check box for the field.

target.mrk: Chcete-li určit, že data pole by neměla být ověřena, zrušte zaškrtnutí políčka **Ověřit pole** pro konkrétní pole.

trans-unit.source: Determine whether you have introduced potential errors, by choosing the **Validate Package** action.

seg-source.mrk: Determine whether you have introduced potential errors, by choosing the **Validate Package** action.

target.mrk: Zjistěte, zda jste zavedli potenciální chyby, výběrem akce **Ověřit balíček**.

trans-unit.source: This can occur when you do not include tables that your configuration relies on.

seg-source.mrk: This can occur when you do not include tables that your configuration relies on.

target.mrk: K tomu může dojít, pokud nezahrnete tabulky, na které vaše konfigurace spoléhá.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **OK** button.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **OK** button.

target.mrk: Zvolte tlačítko **OK**.

trans-unit.source: After you have refined the list of fields to include from a table, you can check your results in Excel.

seg-source.mrk: After you have refined the list of fields to include from a table, you can check your results in Excel.

target.mrk: Po upřesnění seznamu polí, která mají být zahrnuta z tabulky, můžete zkontrolovat své výsledky v aplikaci Excel.

trans-unit.source: To filter and review your dataset

seg-source.mrk: To filter and review your dataset

target.mrk: Pro filtrování a kontrolu sady dat

trans-unit.source: To filter to a certain set of records to include in the package, on the **Lines** tab, choose the **Filters** action, and then specify the appropriate filter values.

seg-source.mrk: To filter to a certain set of records to include in the package, on the **Lines** tab, choose the **Filters** action, and then specify the appropriate filter values.

target.mrk: Pro filtrování určité sady záznamů, která má být součástí balíčku, vyberte na kartě **Řádky** akci **Filtry** a zadejte příslušné hodnoty filtru.

trans-unit.source: On the package card, on the **Lines** tab, choose the **Export to Excel** action.

seg-source.mrk: On the package card, on the **Lines** tab, choose the **Export to Excel** action.

target.mrk: Na kartě balíčku vyberte na kartě **Řádky** akci **Exportovat do aplikace Excel**.

trans-unit.source: Confirm the messages that enable the export of data to Excel.

seg-source.mrk: Confirm the messages that enable the export of data to Excel.

target.mrk: Potvrďte zprávy, které umožňují export dat do Excelu.

trans-unit.source: The named .xlsx file opens.

seg-source.mrk: The named .xlsx file opens.

target.mrk: Otevře se pojmenovaný soubor .xlsx.

trans-unit.source: Review the records that have been exported.

seg-source.mrk: Review the records that have been exported.

target.mrk: Zkontrolujte záznamy, které byly exportovány.

trans-unit.source: Close Excel.

seg-source.mrk: Close Excel.

target.mrk: Zavřete aplikaci Excel.

trans-unit.source: To include a template for application to a table

seg-source.mrk: To include a template for application to a table

target.mrk: Pro zahrnutí šablony pro aplikaci do tabulky

trans-unit.source: For certain tables, such a table that will contain master data, you can specify a template to apply to the data.

seg-source.mrk: For certain tables, such a table that will contain master data, you can specify a template to apply to the data.

target.mrk: Pro určité tabulky, jako je tabulka, která bude obsahovat hlavní data, můžete určit šablonu, která se použije na data.

trans-unit.source: The template can include the required fields that you want to apply to all master data and that you never want to vary.

seg-source.mrk: The template can include the required fields that you want to apply to all master data and that you never want to vary.

target.mrk: Šablona může obsahovat povinná pole, která chcete použít pro všechna hlavní data a která nikdy nechcete měnit.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create a template that can be used with customer data.

seg-source.mrk: For example, you can create a template that can be used with customer data.

target.mrk: Můžete například vytvořit šablonu, kterou lze použít na zákaznická data.

trans-unit.source: The template can contain all the required fields, which then enables consistent import of standardized information.

seg-source.mrk: The template can contain all the required fields, which then enables consistent import of standardized information.

target.mrk: Šablona může obsahovat všechna povinná pole, což umožňuje konzistentní import standardizovaných informací.

trans-unit.source: Information that cannot be standardized, such as customer name, is then treated when you do an import of customer data.

seg-source.mrk: Information that cannot be standardized, such as customer name, is then treated when you do an import of customer data.

target.mrk: Informace, které nelze standardizovat, jako například jméno zákazníka, budou zpracovány při importu zákaznických dat.

trans-unit.source: In the **Config. Package Card** window, select a table, and then choose the **Data Template** field.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Config.
Package Card** window, select a table, and then choose the **Data Template** field.

target.mrk: V okně **Karta
konfiguračního balíčku** zvolte tabulku a poté vyberte pole **Šablona dat**.

trans-unit.source: A list of templates based on the table is displayed.

seg-source.mrk: A list of templates based on the table is displayed.

target.mrk: Zobrazí se seznam šablon na základě tabulky.

trans-unit.source: Select a template, and then choose the **OK** button.

seg-source.mrk: Select a template, and then choose the **OK** button.

target.mrk: Vybere šablonu a poté klepněte na tlačítko **OK**.

trans-unit.source: After the package is complete, follow the next procedure to save the package to a file.

seg-source.mrk: After the package is complete, follow the next procedure to save the package to a file.

target.mrk: Po dokončení balíčku ho uložte do souboru podle následujícího postupu.

trans-unit.source: You can then give the package to a customer or partner to use.

seg-source.mrk: You can then give the package to a customer or partner to use.

target.mrk: Pak můžete dát balíček zákazníkovi nebo partnerovi k použití.

trans-unit.source: To save and export a configuration package

seg-source.mrk: To save and export a configuration package

target.mrk: Pro uložení a export konfiguračního balíčku

trans-unit.source: In the **Config. Package Card** window, choose the **Export Package** action.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Config.
Package Card** window, choose the **Export Package** action.

target.mrk: V okně **Karta
konfiguračního balíčku** zvolte akci **Exportovat balíček**.

trans-unit.source: The package is created in a .rapidstart file, which delivers the package contents in a compressed format.

seg-source.mrk: The package is created in a .rapidstart file, which delivers the package contents in a compressed format.

target.mrk: Balíček je vytvořen v souboru .rapidstart, který doručuje obsah balíčku v komprimovaném formátu.

trans-unit.source: Configuration questionnaires, configuration templates, and the configuration worksheet are added to the package automatically unless you specifically decide to exclude them.

seg-source.mrk: Configuration questionnaires, configuration templates, and the configuration worksheet are added to the package automatically unless you specifically decide to exclude them.

target.mrk: Konfigurační dotazník, konfigurační šablony a konfigurační sešit jsou do balíčku přidávány automaticky, pokud se výslovně nerozhodnete je vyloučit.

trans-unit.source: You can save the file with a name that is meaningful to you, but you cannot change the extension of the file.

seg-source.mrk: You can save the file with a name that is meaningful to you, but you cannot change the extension of the file.

target.mrk: Můžete uložit soubor s názvem, který je pro vás smysluplný, ale nemůžete změnit příponu souboru.

trans-unit.source: It must be .rapidstart.

seg-source.mrk: It must be .rapidstart.

target.mrk: Ta musí být .rapidstart.

trans-unit.source: To copy a configuration package

seg-source.mrk: To copy a configuration package

target.mrk: Pro zkopírování konfiguračního balíčku

trans-unit.source: After you have created a package that meets most of your needs, you can use it as a basis for creating similar packages.

seg-source.mrk: After you have created a package that meets most of your needs, you can use it as a basis for creating similar packages.

target.mrk: Po vytvoření balíčku, který splňuje většinu vašich potřeb, můžete jej použít jako základ pro vytváření podobných balíčků.

trans-unit.source: This can speed up implementation time and enhances the repeatability of RapidStart Services.

seg-source.mrk: This can speed up implementation time and enhances the repeatability of RapidStart Services.

target.mrk: To může urychlit dobu implementace a zvyšuje opakovatelnost služeb RapidStart.

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Configuration Packages**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Configuration Packages**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Zvolte ikonu ![Hledat stránku nebo sestavu](media/ui-search/search_small.png "ikona Hledat stránku nebo sestavu"), klikněte na **Konfigurační balíčky** a poté zvolte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Select a package from the list, and then choose the **Copy Package** action.

seg-source.mrk: Select a package from the list, and then choose the **Copy Package** action.

target.mrk: Vyberte balíček ze seznamu a poté vyberte akci **Kopírovat balíček**.

trans-unit.source: In the **New Package Code** field, enter a code for the new package.

seg-source.mrk: In the **New Package Code** field, enter a code for the new package.

target.mrk: Do pole **Kód nového balíčku** zadejte kód nového balíčku.

trans-unit.source: Select the **Copy Data** check box if you also want to copy database data from the existing package.

seg-source.mrk: Select the **Copy Data** check box if you also want to copy database data from the existing package.

target.mrk: Pokud chcete také kopírovat data databáze z existujícího balíčku, zaškrtněte políčko **Kopírovat data**.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **OK** button.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **OK** button.

target.mrk: Zvolte tlačítko **OK**.

trans-unit.source: To customize a configuration package

seg-source.mrk: To customize a configuration package

target.mrk: Pro přizpůsobení konfiguračního balíčku

trans-unit.source: Use the configuration worksheet to gather and categorize the information that you want to use to configure a new company, and arrange tables in a logical way.

seg-source.mrk: Use the configuration worksheet to gather and categorize the information that you want to use to configure a new company, and arrange tables in a logical way.

target.mrk: Pomocí konfiguračního sešitu můžete shromažďovat a kategorizovat informace, které chcete použít ke konfiguraci nové společnosti, a uspořádat tabulky logickým způsobem.

trans-unit.source: Formatting in the worksheet is based on a simple hierarchy: Areas contain groups, which in turn contain tables.

seg-source.mrk: Formatting in the worksheet is based on a simple hierarchy:
Areas contain groups, which in turn contain tables.

target.mrk: Formátování v sešitu je založeno na jednoduché hierarchii:
Oblasti obsahují skupiny, které zase obsahují tabulky.

trans-unit.source: Areas and groups are optional, but are necessary to enable an overview of the configuration process on the RapidStart Services Role Center.

seg-source.mrk: Areas and groups are optional, but are necessary to enable an overview of the configuration process on the RapidStart Services Role Center.

target.mrk: Oblasti a skupiny jsou volitelné, ale nezbytné pro umožnění přehledu procesu konfigurace v centru rolí služeb RapidStart.

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Zvolte ikonu ![Vyhledat Stránku nebo Sestavu](media/ui-search/search_small.png "ikona Vyhledat stránku nebo sestavu"), klikněte na **Konfigurační sešit** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: In the **Line Type** field, choose **Area**.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Line Type** field, choose **Area**.

target.mrk: V poli **Typ řádku** vyberte **Oblast**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Name** field, enter a descriptive name.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Name** field, enter a descriptive name.

target.mrk: Do pole **Název** zadejte popisný název.

trans-unit.source: In the **Line Type** field, choose **Group**.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Line Type** field, choose **Group**.

target.mrk: V poli **Typ řádku** vyberte **Skupina**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Name** field, enter a descriptive name.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Name** field, enter a descriptive name.

target.mrk: Do pole **Název** zadejte popisný název.

trans-unit.source: In the **Line Type** field, choose **Table**.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Line Type** field, choose **Table**.

target.mrk: V poli **Typ řádku** vyberte **Tabulka**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Table ID** field, select the table you want to include in the worksheet.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Table ID** field, select the table you want to include in the worksheet.

target.mrk: V poli **ID tabulky** vyberte tabulku, kterou chcete do sešitu zahrnout.

trans-unit.source: You can now assign the tables to specific configuration packages that you have created or plan to create.

seg-source.mrk: You can now assign the tables to specific configuration packages that you have created or plan to create.

target.mrk: Nyní můžete tabulky přiřadit ke konkrétním konfiguračním balíčkům, které jste vytvořili nebo plánujete vytvořit.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "To assign a table to a configuration package" section.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see the "To assign a table to a configuration package" section.

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte sekci “Pro přiřazení tabulky konfiguračnímu balíčku“.

trans-unit.source: To work with promoted tables

seg-source.mrk: To work with promoted tables

target.mrk: Pro práci s zvýrazněnými tabulkami

trans-unit.source: Select the **Promoted Table** check box to indicate a table that is frequently used during the setup process by a typical customer, for example, the **G/L Account** table.

seg-source.mrk: Select the **Promoted Table** check box to indicate a table that is frequently used during the setup process by a typical customer, for example, the **G/L Account** table.

target.mrk: Zaškrtněte políčko **Zvýrazněná tabulka** a označte tabulku, která se často používá během procesu nastavení typickým zákazníkem, například tabulka **Finanční účet**.

trans-unit.source: When a table has this designation, a customer will be able to easily filter his worksheet to see just the list of promoted tables that require attention.

seg-source.mrk: When a table has this designation, a customer will be able to easily filter his worksheet to see just the list of promoted tables that require attention.

target.mrk: Pokud má tabulka toto označení, bude zákazník moci snadno filtrovat svůj sešit a zobrazit pouze seznam zvýrazněných tabulek, které vyžadují pozornost.

trans-unit.source: To see the filtered view, choose the **Promoted Only** action.

seg-source.mrk: To see the filtered view, choose the **Promoted Only** action.

target.mrk: Chcete-li zobrazit filtrované zobrazení, vyberte akci **Pouze zvýrazněné**.

trans-unit.source: The list of tables contains only those tables that have the check box selected.

seg-source.mrk: The list of tables contains only those tables that have the check box selected.

target.mrk: Seznam tabulek obsahuje pouze ty tabulky, které mají zaškrtnuté políčko.

trans-unit.source: To assign a table to a configuration package

seg-source.mrk: To assign a table to a configuration package

target.mrk: Pro přiřazení tabulky konfiguračnímu balíčku

trans-unit.source: After you have defined the tables that you want to treat as part of your configuration, you can easily assign the tables to configuration packages.

seg-source.mrk: After you have defined the tables that you want to treat as part of your configuration, you can easily assign the tables to configuration packages.

target.mrk: Po definování tabulek, které chcete považovat za součást vaší konfigurace, můžete tabulky snadno přiřadit konfiguračním balíčkům.

trans-unit.source: You can assign a table to one package only.

seg-source.mrk: You can assign a table to one package only.

target.mrk: Tabulku můžete přiřadit pouze k jednomu balíčku.

trans-unit.source: In the following procedure, you assign the package from within configuration worksheet.

seg-source.mrk: In the following procedure, you assign the package from within configuration worksheet.

target.mrk: V následujícím postupu přiřadíte balíček zevnitř konfiguračního sešitu.

trans-unit.source: You can also create a package directly, and add tables to it.

seg-source.mrk: You can also create a package directly, and add tables to it.

target.mrk: Balíček můžete také vytvořit přímo a přidat do něj tabulky.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "To create a configuration package" section.

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see the "To create a configuration package" section.

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte sekci “Pro vytvoření konfiguračního balíčku“.

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Zvolte ikonu ![Vyhledat Stránku nebo Sestavu](media/ui-search/search_small.png "ikona Vyhledat stránku nebo sestavu"), klikněte na **Konfigurační sešit** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: In the configuration worksheet, select a line or group of lines that you want to assign to a configuration package, and then choose the **Assign Package** action.

seg-source.mrk: In the configuration worksheet, select a line or group of lines that you want to assign to a configuration package, and then choose the **Assign Package** action.

target.mrk: V konfiguračním sešitu vyberte řádek nebo skupinu řádků, které chcete přiřadit konfiguračnímu balíčku, a poté vyberte akci **Přiřadit balíček**.

trans-unit.source: Select a package from the list, or choose the **New** action to create a new package, and then choose the **OK** button.

seg-source.mrk: Select a package from the list, or choose the **New** action to create a new package, and then choose the **OK** button.

target.mrk: Vyberte balíček ze seznamu nebo zvolte akci **Nový** a vytvořte nový balíček a poté stiskněte tlačítko **OK**.

trans-unit.source: If a table is not already included in the package, it will now be added.

seg-source.mrk: If a table is not already included in the package, it will now be added.

target.mrk: Pokud tabulka již není součástí balíčku, bude přidána nyní.

trans-unit.source: The package code field on the worksheet line will be filled in with the code of the package that the table is assigned to.

seg-source.mrk: The package code field on the worksheet line will be filled in with the code of the package that the table is assigned to.

target.mrk: Pole kódu balíčku na řádku sešitu bude vyplněno kódem balíčku, ke kterému je tabulka přiřazena.

trans-unit.source: If you choose an existing package, you can see how many tables are already in the package by reviewing the information in the **No. of Tables** field.

seg-source.mrk: If you choose an existing package, you can see how many tables are already in the package by reviewing the information in the **No. of Tables** field.

target.mrk: Pokud vyberete existující balíček, můžete zjistit, kolik tabulek je již v balíčku, a to kontrolou informací v poli **Počet tabulek**.

trans-unit.source: To review or customize existing database data

seg-source.mrk: To review or customize existing database data

target.mrk: Pro zkontrolování nebo úpravu existujících dat databáze

trans-unit.source: As you create a configuration package for a solution, you can view and customize the available database data to suit your customer needs.

seg-source.mrk: As you create a configuration package for a solution, you can view and customize the available database data to suit your customer needs.

target.mrk: Při vytváření konfiguračního balíčku pro řešení si můžete prohlížet a přizpůsobovat dostupná databázová data podle svých potřeb.

trans-unit.source: The database table must have an associated page.

seg-source.mrk: The database table must have an associated page.

target.mrk: Databázová tabulka musí mít přidruženou stránku.

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Zvolte ikonu ![Vyhledat Stránku nebo Sestavu](media/ui-search/search_small.png "ikona Vyhledat stránku nebo sestavu"), klikněte na **Konfigurační sešit** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: In the configuration worksheet, identify the tables whose data that you want to view or customize.

seg-source.mrk: In the configuration worksheet, identify the tables whose data that you want to view or customize.

target.mrk: V konfiguračním sešitu určete tabulky, jejichž data chcete zobrazit nebo přizpůsobit.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that each table has a page ID assigned to it.

seg-source.mrk: Make sure that each table has a page ID assigned to it.

target.mrk: Ujistěte se, že každé tabulce je přiřazeno ID stránky.

trans-unit.source: For standard [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] tables, this value is automatically filled in.

seg-source.mrk: For standard [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] tables, this value is automatically filled in.

target.mrk: U standardních tabulek [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] je tato hodnota automaticky vyplněna.

trans-unit.source: For custom tables, you must provide the ID.

seg-source.mrk: For custom tables, you must provide the ID.

target.mrk: U vlastních tabulek musíte ID uvést.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Database Data** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Database Data** action.

target.mrk: Vyberte akci **Data databáze**.

trans-unit.source: The window for the related page opens.

seg-source.mrk: The window for the related page opens.

target.mrk: Otevře se okno pro související stránky.

trans-unit.source: Review the available information.

seg-source.mrk: Review the available information.

target.mrk: Zkontrolujte dostupné informace.

trans-unit.source: Modify it as necessary by deleting records that are not relevant or by adding new ones.

seg-source.mrk: Modify it as necessary by deleting records that are not relevant or by adding new ones.

target.mrk: Upravte ji podle potřeb odstraněním záznamů, které nejsou relevantní, nebo přidáním nových.

trans-unit.source: To copy data from a test environment to a production environment

seg-source.mrk: To copy data from a test environment to a production environment

target.mrk: Pro kopírování dat z testovacího prostředí do produkčního prostředí

trans-unit.source: After you have vetted and tested all your setup information, you can proceed to copy data to your production environment.

seg-source.mrk: After you have vetted and tested all your setup information, you can proceed to copy data to your production environment.

target.mrk: Po prověření a otestování všech vašich informací o nastavení můžete pokračovat v kopírování dat do produkčního prostředí.

trans-unit.source: You create a new company in the same database.

seg-source.mrk: You create a new company in the same database.

target.mrk: Ve stejné databázi vytvoříte novou společnost.

trans-unit.source: Open and initialize the new company.

seg-source.mrk: Open and initialize the new company.

target.mrk: Otevřete a inicializujte novou společnost.

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Configuration Worksheet**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Zvolte ikonu ![Vyhledat Stránku nebo Sestavu](media/ui-search/search_small.png "ikona Vyhledat stránku nebo sestavu"), klikněte na **Konfigurační sešit** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Copy Data from the Company** action.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Copy Data from the Company** action.

target.mrk: Zvolte akci **Kopírovat data ze společnosti**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Copy Company Data** window, choose the **Copy From** field.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Copy Company Data** window, choose the **Copy From** field.

target.mrk: V okně **Kopírovat data společnosti** vyberte pole **Kopie z**.

trans-unit.source: The **Companies** window opens.

seg-source.mrk: The **Companies** window opens.

target.mrk: Otevře se okno **Společnosti**.

trans-unit.source: Select the company from which you want to copy data, and then choose the **OK** button.

seg-source.mrk: Select the company from which you want to copy data, and then choose the **OK** button.

target.mrk: Vyberte společnost, ze které chcete data zkopírovat, a poté stiskněte tlačítko **OK**.

trans-unit.source: A list of tables selected on the configuration worksheet opens.

seg-source.mrk: A list of tables selected on the configuration worksheet opens.

target.mrk: Otevře se seznam tabulek vybraných v konfiguračním sešitu.

trans-unit.source: Only tables that contain records are included in this list.

seg-source.mrk: Only tables that contain records are included in this list.

target.mrk: Tento seznam obsahuje pouze tabulky, které obsahují záznamy.

trans-unit.source: Select the tables that you want to copy data from, and then choose the **Copy Data** action.

seg-source.mrk: Select the tables that you want to copy data from, and then choose the **Copy Data** action.

target.mrk: Vyberte tabulky, ze kterých chcete kopírovat data, a poté vyberte akci **Kopírovat data**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Copy Company Data** window, choose the **OK** button.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Copy Company Data** window, choose the **OK** button.

target.mrk: V okně **Kopírovat data společnosti** stiskněte tlačítko **OK**.
